snippet.title: The Mistral Report: Invisible Affairs - gameplay 1 - DOSBox-X
snippet.description:
A quick glimpse into the gameplay of The Mistral Report, an espionage-themed turn-based RPG for classic early 32-bit machines.

Infiltrating a secret safe-house in Luxembourg and recovering intel.



Download the full game for free at: https://montyontherun.itch.io/the-mistral-report
